title: Murkowski Condemns UAF Negligence in Sexual Assault Cases (Lisa Murkowski)
text: ( Source : Lisa Murkowski ) Today U.S. Senator Lisa Murkowski reacted to the University of Alaska Fairbanks ' announcement that it failed to follow the U.S. Department of Education 's (USED) Office of Civil Rights ( OCR ) Title IX guidance in how
